experiment type.description: A class reference is the SKOS preferred label of a class. This label MUST be unique within the transitive closure of the vocabulary referenced by the manifest.

container type.description: A class reference is the SKOS preferred label of a class. This label MUST be unique within the transitive closure of the vocabulary referenced by the manifest.

tClass.description: A class reference is the SKOS preferred label of a class. This label MUST be unique within the transitive closure of the vocabulary referenced by the manifest.

tUnit.description: A unit is referenced by its QUDT symbol. It MUST be unique within the QUDT units defined in the vocabularies declared in the manifest.

tStringValue.description: A literal string in UTF-8 encoding.

tDateTimeValue.description: All timestamps MUST be in ISO8601 date/time format.

tDateTimeStampValue.description: All timestamps MUST be in ISO8601 date/time format.

@componentDatatype.description: Subset of XSD datatypes supported in simple models

cFillValueBoolean.$comment: constraint on fill values if component data type is boolean

cFillValueIEEE.$comment: constraint on fill values if component data type is any numeric type

cFillValueDecimal.$comment: constraint on fill values if component data type is any numeric type

cFillValueString.$comment: constraint on fill values if component data type is string

tTupleData.$comment: heterogenous array of data used in point arrays

tDimensionArray.$comment: homogenous array of data used in explicit dimension arrays

tMeasureArray.$comment: homogenous array of data used in explicit measure arrays, may contain null values

tNumberOrNullArray.$comment: homogenous array of numbers, may contain null values

tBooleanOrNullArray.$comment: homogenous array of booleans, may contain null values

tStringOrNullArray.$comment: homogenous array of strings, may contain null values
